mapper.insert: insert into release_schedule(rel_schedule_cd, wh_cd, product_cd_name, rel_date, remarks, rel_count,pchor_cd) values(#{rel_schedule_cd}, #{wh_cd}, #{product_cd_name}, #{rel_date},#{remarks}, #{rel_count}, #{pchor_cd})
insert into release_schedule(rel_schedule_cd, wh_cd, product_cd_name, rel_date, rel_count,pchor_cd) values(#{rel_schedule_cd}, #{wh_cd}, #{product_cd_name}, #{rel_date}, #{rel_count}, #{pchor_cd})
mapper.select: select max(SUBSTR(rel_schedule_cd, 2)) from release_schedule where rel_schedule_cd like 'L%'

select l.rel_schedule_cd, c.rec_schedule_cd, c.wh_cd, c.pchor_cd, c.rec_count, c.product_cd_name, l.rel_date, l.rel_count, l.remarks from release_schedule l join receive_schedule c on l.wh_cd = c.wh_cd where rel_schedule_cd = #{rel_schedule_cd}
mapper.update: update release_schedule set wh_cd = #{wh_cd}, product_cd_name = #{product_cd_name}, pchor_cd = #{pchor_cd}, rel_date = #{rel_date}, remarks = #{remarks}, rel_count = #{rel_count} where rel_schedule_cd = #{rel_schedule_cd}
